title: Amy Childs flaunts two stone weight loss with incredible before and after picture
text:

Amy Childs has demonstrated her body transformation after losing two stone with a before and after comparison snap.

Taking to Instagram to flaunt her post-baby figure, the former TOWIE star, 29, uploaded two snaps that highlighted how far she has come on her fitness journey.

She wore black lycra shorts in both the images teamed with a black vest that she lifted to expose her stomach in the near identical pictures.

The left snap showed Amy two stone heavier as she posed against a cream wall and the right showed the mother-of-two's washboard stomach.

Fans rushed to the comments to commend the star and tell how they have been inspired to overhaul their lifestyle after her success.

(Image: Instagram)

"I need to do this had my 4th and can’t seem to find the time or energy to get going u look amazing," wrote one.

Others added: "Wow Amy well done girl you look great!" and "Well done huni you have motivated me to loose this baby weight ! Xx."

Another typed: "need to do something after having my baby 6 months ago now I just need that kick."

Amy recently revealed that she has shed the pounds after doing thirty minute exercises every day, while also enjoying the odd treat.

She went from a size 14 to a size 10 following her plan.

(Image: Instagram)

The bombshell has been sharing her weight loss on social media alongside one upload, she wrote: "I've been quiet over the last few months as I’ve been working hard on myself, and trying to get myself fit and healthy again.

"After having my second baby I just wanted to take my time getting back in shape.

"My body had been through a lot having two babies in 2 years and I didn't want to give into the pressure to bounce back into my skinny jeans straight away.

(Image: Amy Childs Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"My youngest is now 1, I've still enjoyed the odd Prosecco here and there (you know I love it!) but I've working out at home for 30 minutes most days over the last 6 months, eating healthily and I'm so proud of myself for what I've achieved.

"I feel the best I've felt literally in years."

Amy is mum to Polly, two, and a one-year-old baby boy.

Last month she split with her boyfriend Ritchie just 11 months after their son was born.
description: The former TOWIE star has inspired fans to follow in her fitness footsteps after sharing a comparison snap
